name: Arcane
short_desc: Modern Docker Management, Made for Everyone
author: kmendell
description: Arcane is a modern, intuitive Docker management platform designed for everyone. It provides a clean web interface to manage containers, images, networks, volumes, and Docker projects. With features like real-time monitoring, automatic updates, and environment management, Arcane makes Docker management accessible and efficient.

form_fields.label: Encryption Key
form_fields.hint: 32 bytes encryption key for data security (raw/base64/hex format)

form_fields.label: JWT Secret
form_fields.hint: Secret key for JWT token generation
